text: Time from start of ischemia Histologic features 12-24hours « Redt newrons cosinophiic cytoplasm + pyknotic nuceus) 1-3days + Neutrophils » Liquefactive necrosis 3-5 days + Macrophages (microia, CDA0-positiv) » Reactive gliosis (astrocytes) 5-15days + Vascular proliferation > 15 days + Glial scarring + Cyst formation =]
